ygData.subject: First moves
ygData.msgSnippet: Tyrael thought for a moment. Of course, establishing a perimeter was a priority, but making certain that they were at the right place was more important.

Tyrael thought for a moment. Of course, establishing a perimeter was a 
priority, but making certain that they were at the right place was 
more important.

Tyrael: Cancel your present orders. We have to know where we are 
first. Shadow Star, activate a stasis pod as soon as you have taken a 
beast mode. Once you are done, come and see me. Naga and Talon, check 
the long range scanners for any thermal sources other than geological. 
Try to see if you detect any energy signatures.

OOC: I'll take the new bot, and anyone else who is interested by a 
new char, just let me know.
